cluster_relations.rel_desc: Grave goods are intended to provide comfort to the deceased in the afterlife.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is intended, within ancient Egyptian belief, to provide use, sustenance, or other benefits to the deceased in the afterlife.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Ancient Egyptian Afterlife Beliefs and Concepts
cluster_relations.object_class_group: Ancient Egyptian Funerary Religion and Culture

qualifiers.ConditionExpression: if the deceased reaches the afterlife

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Grave goods are also intended to provide sustenance to the deceased in the afterlife.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is intended, within ancient Egyptian belief, to provide use, sustenance, or other benefits to the deceased in the afterlife.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Ancient Egyptian Afterlife Beliefs and Concepts
cluster_relations.object_class_group: Ancient Egyptian Funerary Religion and Culture

qualifiers.SpatialQualifier: for the deceased in the afterlife

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Food offerings are meant as provisions for the deceased in the afterlife.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is intended, within ancient Egyptian belief, to provide use, sustenance, or other benefits to the deceased in the afterlife.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Ancient Egyptian Afterlife Beliefs and Concepts
cluster_relations.object_class_group: Ancient Egyptian Funerary Religion and Culture

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Safe passage into the afterlife is a desired outcome specifically for the deceased individual.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Links an afterlife condition, state, or benefit to the deceased individual who is intended to experience or receive it.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Ancient Egyptian Afterlife Beliefs and Concepts
cluster_relations.subject_class_group: Ancient Egyptian Funerary Religion and Culture
